summary: THE CONSUMER NOTICED FUEL LEAKAGE FROM THE TANK.  THE DEALER DIAGNOSED A HOLE IN THE TANK.  THE TANK HAD  LEAKED AGAIN.  THE CONSUMER CONTACTED THE MANUFACTURER WHO ADVISED HER THAT THE V.I.N. WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RELATED RECALL 92V117000.  TS  AFTER THE PURCHASE OF THE VEHICLE, A SUSPENSION BAR WAS NEEDED, AND WITHIN THE FIRST YEAR, THE IGNITION SWITCH WAS REPLACED.  THE CONSUMER WAS ADVISED TO KEEP THE FUEL AT HALF FULL.  SCC
